title: 10 .NET Developers (Middle and Senior level)
description:
Greetings! My name is Maria, I am in urgent need to find a team of 10 .NET Developers (Middle and Senior level) to join the product company - my customer from Sweden. 

6+ years project (monolith with some microservices). The platform lets distributors, sellers, MSPs and vendors build, sell, deliver, and operate multi-cloud, SaaS, and managed services catalog. The user-friendly self-service platform allows customers to buy and manage services and subscriptions while enabling account managers to administer prices, issue quotes and publish cloud offerings. It supports multi-tier contract relationships as well as multi-tier billing and invoicing, comprehensive consumption and subscription reports and more.



Conditions:

Remote
Salary: 3000-5000 USD gross
Full time (40 hours per week)
Direct contract 



Tech stack:

ASP NET Web API (.NET 4.7), .Net Core, ASP.NET (http://asp.net/) Core API, MS SQL Server, Entity Framework, Angular 9, React, Azure



Requirements:



- 2+ years of hands-on experience of .Net development (C#);

- Strong skills in .Net Framework (.Net Core would be a plus);

- Database skills, SQL knowledge;

- English: intermediate or higher.

- Entity Framework; Web API.



You‚Äôre welcome to ask me additional questions. Please, send your CV and salary expectations if you are interested! Thank you in advance!

title: 10X Engineer (co-founder, #4 employee, USD 11-12k, 1-4% equity)
description:
**Product**
The product is a live video chat and co-browsing with website visitors. It helps companies generate more customers with instant video meetings directly on visitor‚Äôs website while they‚Äôre browsing a company‚Äôs page. It‚Äôs like a virtual web attendant that greets you on the web and guides through company‚Äôs products, much like they do in real-world stores.

It‚Äôs been in development for 5 months, sales started 2 months ago, already has 7 paid enterprise customers.

It already received $3mln funding, incl. from Google and couple of US tech billionaries.

**Team**
- Daniel ‚Äî Founder, previously Co-founder / CTO at couple other companies, incl. CTO at myetherwallet.com, winner of Peter Thiel Foundation scholarship
- Will ‚Äî founding engineer, 11 yrs experience, previously VP Engineering at coder.com and Senior Engineer at OkCupid.com
- Aaron ‚Äî founding engineer, 15 yrs experience
- You ‚Äî founding engineer, with 1-4% equity

**Stage**
- 5 months in development, e.g. almost from scratch
- You will be a co-founder and #4 on the team with 1-4% equity
- Already has 7 paying enterprise customers
- Received $3mln funding, incl. from Google
- New features development only; no legacy

**Tech stack**
- React, Typescript, Redux, Python, Flask, SQLAlchemy, Celery, WebRTC, WebSockets, Heroku
- Expert-level with frontend is a must, but you have to be comfortable working across the stack
- Highly preferred if you‚Äôre experienced with a broader range of technologies (Python, Java, Go, C#, PHP etc)

**What will you do**
- Build prototypes and features from start to finish: plan, build, test, deploy, iterate
- Work in a small, very experienced, high performing, self-managed team
- Have a lot of remote collaboration and getting feedback directly from users

**Nearest features**
- Scaling the system (WebSockets is a challenge here)
- Session replay
- Mobile app
- Analytics
- Video voicemails

**Your profile**
- Have an ownership mindset, value low process, high impact and real ownership in the company
- Expert-level with the browser, incl. for example knowing Chrome RFCs
- Experience developing products from scratch and in a ‚Äúmove fast and break things‚Äù environment
- Have strong opinions on tech decisions, but happy to continuously challenge it
- Thoughtful about creating and mantaining a world-class engineering culture in the company

**What‚Äôs offered**
- $11-12k/m compensation + 1-4% equity
- Fully remote work, important are results
- Move fast and break things approach
- Low process, high impact environment
- Direct contract with client (after 1-2 months of outstaffing)

title: 16 - Amazon Brand Manager
description:
Currently, TCM expanding its activities to Ukraine and we are hiring staff for our** offices in Kiev**. All the positions are offered on an equal opportunity to all races, religious, gender, nationalities, and color.

**The Role**
This role is for self-starter to manage products portfolio, ensuring their success day-to-day including content and creative, marketing, financial health of the business, customer service, risk mitigation and compliance, inventory, and growth strategies. Brand success will be based on your intimate knowledge of the brand you manage, ability to diagnose issues and develop action plans.

**Responsibilities:**
- Analyze Amazon product sales, conversation rate, page views, costs, etc. to determine why certain products are trending up or down, clearly articulate observations and propose strategies to troubleshoot problems.
- Maintaining product success on Amazon and strive to become best seller, monitoring metrics shifts, follow market trends, adding customer profiles, daily reporting, pricing changes, manage remote teams, inventory management spread among several locations and warehouses.
- Develop strategies to increase sales, reduce costs, improve conversion rate, price optimization, PPC optimization, packaging/inserts including dimensions, coupons and deals, customer communications, subscribe and save, removing unprofitable products, etc.
- Analyze reports, coordinating with finance department cashflow and accurate PandL.
- Identify potential issues before they convert to problems and understand the operating environment in which your products are selling (e.g., competitors, BSR, categories, Amazon TOS changes).
- Research programs and tools on Amazon and other marketplaces to expand the brand and ensure protecting it (e.g., Amazon Project Zero, Transparency).
- Prepare, monitor, and understand the migration process during acquisition process of a new brand. This includes doing a deep dive of all information provided during due diligence, migrating the prior seller‚Äôs accounts (social media, emails, customer service management, warehouses, inventory, etc.), developing good relationship with the seller get his full cooperation during and after the migration.
- Interface with legal team regarding an intellectual property or legal issues, such as product suspension or identifying ‚Äúhijackers‚Äù.
- Coordinate with customer satisfaction team to ensure we prove best experience for your product portfolio.
- Manage product pre-launches, launches and expansion.
- Coordinate with the supply chain to ensure products always in stock with best quality, have the right labeling, and have all the required documentations.

**OUR PERFECT CANDIDATE:**
- **2+ years of proven e-commerce experience**, preferably with **Amazon **product management, marketing, or an analytical function, preferably at a startup or other fast-paced environment.
- Good understanding of **SEO, PPC** and tools used inside and outside of Amazon.
- Ability to dig through data, analyze and provide recommendations from your insights.
- **Excellent English** written and verbal communication skills, a high level of organization, and impeccable attention to detail.
- Ability to handle aggressive deadlines and prioritize work in a fast-paced, often ambiguous environment daily.
- A highly analytical person who can manage multiple projects and figure out complex problems.
- Demonstrated ability to create engaging content, come up with creative ideas, and think outside the box.
- Positive attitude, reliable, transparent and enjoy working with different types of people.
- Familiar with other platforms such as **Walmart, eBay, Shopify**, etc. ‚Äì advantage.
- Strong proficiency in **Excel/Google Sheets**.

We offer:
* An interesting and challenging work
* A friendly work environment, with a good work-life balance
* office in the center of Kyiv.
* Lunches in office and full fridge all the time.
* Paid vocations and sick leaves
* Taxes compensation
* Medical insurance.
* Joining GIFT

We are waiting for your CV)))

title: 1926/07 Senior Java Software Engineer
description:
**Your responsibilities**
- Take ownership of the design, development and maintenance of microservices powering our open platform for the energy and utilities industry.
- Work on scalable components performing financial transactions, billing calculations and quotations for millions of energy consumers and metering points.
- Analyze our legacy components in terms of throughput, latency, security and reliability and proactively drive refactorings and rebuilds.
- Create POCs demonstrating the power of JVM technologies and frameworks and act as an evangelist to share your knowledge with the company.
- Mentor and coach junior developers in pair programming sessions.

**Our requirements**
- You have a degree in computer science or a related subject.
- You have profound experience as a backend engineer.
- You have hands-on coding skills in Microservice architectures using Java 8+, Spring Boot, Hibernate or related JVM-based technology Stacks.
- You have a background working with event-driven architectures using RabbitMQ, NATs or Kafka
- You have experience working with SQL and NoSQL databases, preferably MySQL
- You have strong conceptual knowledge of OO-patterns, Domain Driven Design, and database design.
- You have strong technical coaching and mentoring skills.
= You are proficient in English and keen to work in an international environment.

**Our tech stack**
Java 11, Spring Boot, MySQL/MariaDB, Bitbucket, Jenkins, AWS.

**What we offer**
- You are going to be part of a vibrant and international developer team who revolutionizes the energy industry with leading-edge technologies.
- We know that our employees make the difference. Therefore we take care of every team member individually and provide manifold training opportunities.
- Our teams work with agile methods without outdated structures.
- We offer you an environment in which you can fulfill yourself and that enables your success as part of the whole.
- Possibility to work from the Kharkiv office or remotely.
- Paid sick leave/vacation days (6/15 working days per year).
- Stability and excellent conditions for long-term cooperation.

title: 1940 Middle Java Developer + Welcome Bonus!
description:
Work at Exadel - Who We Are:
Since 1998, Exadel has been engineering its own software products and custom software for clients of all sizes. Headquartered in Walnut Creek, California, Exadel currently has 1700+ employees in development centers across America, Europe, and Asia. Our people drive Exadel‚Äôs success, and they are at the core of our values, so Exadel is a people-first cultured company.

About Our Customer:
The —Åustomer is a leading provider of vehicle lifecycle solutions, enabling the companies that build, insure, repair, and replace vehicles to power the next generation of transportation. The company delivers advanced mobile, artificial intelligence, and connected car technologies through its platform, connecting a vibrant network of 350+ insurance companies, 24,000+ repair facilities, OEMs, hundreds of parts suppliers, and dozens of third-party data and service providers. The customer's collective set of solutions inform decision-making, enhance productivity, and help clients deliver faster and better experiences for end consumers.‚ÄØ 
The —Åustomer‚Äôs company was ranked #17 in the Top 100 Digital Companies in Chicago in 2020 by Built in Chicago, an online community for digital technology entrepreneurs in Chicago, and was named one of Forbes best mid-sized companies to work for in 2019 ‚Äì an important accolade and retention tool for the 2,600+ full-time company employees (alongside 350 dedicated contractors). 

About Our Project:
The team creates a software platform for the collection, analysis, processing, and reporting of automatically generated vehicle telemetry for new automobiles. These services process terabytes of information and integrate with artificial intelligence models to identify and assess crashes and their severity. Driver behavior, active safety features, and environmental conditions are just some of the data attributes collected and evaluated in real time. In the event of accidents, these services initiate automated responses in the form of emergency assistance, vehicle transport, a replacement vehicle, medical services, etc.

Project Team:
Team 1:
1 Lead Software Engineer, 2 Software Engineer, 1 DevOps Engineer, 1 AQA, and 1 Senior Product Owner
Team 2:
2 Software Engineers, 2 AQAs, and 1 Business Analyst

Project Advantages: 
Gain experience working with large data volumes and high-scale processing
Gain experience in vehicle telematics        
Gain experience with microservices
Project Tech Stack:
Java 8+, AWS, Containerization (Docker & Kubernetes), DropWizard/Spring boot, No SQL (DynamoDB), and Async Messaging (Kafka/Active MQ)

Current Project Stage:
Resourcing 

Requirements:
    Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, mathematics, or a related field
    2+ years of experience developing Java-based applications.
    Strong experience with Java 8+, OOP, and REST services
    Good understanding of microservices-based software design and best practices
    Knowledge of software design patterns
    Experience with any of the following:
        ‚ó¶ NoSQL data stores, Relational DBs, Object stores, cache frameworks
        ‚ó¶ Docker / Kubernetes
        ‚ó¶ Drop wizard or Spring Boot
        ‚ó¶ Apache Kafka
    Familiarity with Git or another modern source repository
    Strong experience in unit testing principles and methodologies        
    Experience in Agile and Scrum practices
    A quality-oriented mindset, focused on product delivery
    A strong capacity and desire to learn
    Proven ability to collaborate and proven ability to lead junior engineers

Responsibilities: 
Collaborate with product stakeholder teams to identify and implement functional and non-functional requirements
Be responsible for on-time delivery of high-quality software and infrastructure components
Work closely with engineering team members and architects to design, develop, and test all tiers of the application 
Participate in ongoing maintenance and support, including resolving any production issues/defects when needed
Ensure that the services are built and deployed in an automated fashion
Mentor and assist in the training and onboarding of other team members
Participate in open, frank discussions, especially in technical matters, while giving and accepting feedback and constructive criticism

Top Skills:
Java EE
Rest Web Services
Drop Wizard or Spring Boot 
Microservices

Nice to Have:
Web Service technologies:
‚ó¶ GraphQL
‚ó¶ WebSockets
OAuth2
AWS technologies:
‚ó¶ Lambda
‚ó¶ Kinesis
‚ó¶ Dynamo
‚ó¶ Aurora

Advantages of Working with Exadel:
You can build your expertise with our Sales Support team, who provide assistance with existing and potential projects
You can join any Exadel Community or create your own to communicate with like-minded colleagues
You can participate in continuing education as a mentor or speaker 
You can take part in internal and external meetups as a speaker or listener. We support you in broadening your horizons and encourage knowledge sharing for all of our employees
You can learn English with the support of native speakers

Is a spin-off trading card game based on the World Wide mythology. The game will focus on collecting cards, building decks with various strategies and dueling other players online. The goal of the game is to evolve the digital TCG experience in never seen before visual presentation on mobiles.

Infopulse is inviting a talented professional to join our growing team as a Level 2 support engineer you will be part of a team that manages and supports Bosch.IO open-source projects. Together with Open Source Consultants, you will be enabling Bosch.IO open source activities.

Infopulse is inviting a talented professional to join our growing team as a Level 2 support engineer you will be part of a team that manages and supports Bosch.IO open-source projects. Together with Open Source Consultants, you will be enabling Bosch.IO open source activities.

**Areas of Responsibility**

Become a Level 2 support engineer for our product OCaaS ( e.g. Open Source License Scans).
Understand our product OCaaS in detail very well and also think outside the box
Our 1-level support, consisting of two colleagues, receives support requests from our Bosch internal customers via Jira ticket and chat (our customers are about 800 developers within Bosch), often technical support (2-level support) is needed for these tickets.
Discuss problems with our development team and be part of our Scrum team.
Communicate solutions in a simple and understandable way to our customers

**Qualifications**

Interest in learning new things
Friendly, communicative appearance, team player
First experience with an object-oriented programming language (ideally Kotlin or/and Java)
First experiences with build tools (e.g. NPM, Maven, Gradle, ..)
Interest in open source development and compliance
Experience with Jira is an advantage
Git version control experience
Very good knowledge of written and spoken English

title: 2nd Line Support Engineer
description:
At Onventis we assign teams to work with the customer needs, we don‚Äôt give them specific solutions to implement.

We strive to understand the problem first, ‚Äúlive it‚Äù and deliver the products which make a difference for our end users.

As we do product development, it also means a strong bond to software development teams, where the product is being designed, implemented and improved.

We invite you to join our empowered team to help us improve our product and guide customers through technical questions.

Our customer support team is based in the Netherlands and consists of 3 support engineer and 2 customer success managers, and the software development team is based in Ukraine, Dnipro.

- MS SQL Studio

- Type Script
- MS Azure monitoring tools

title: 3D Artist/3D Generalist
3D Artist/ 3D Generalist (for the NFT Art)
description:
**AllSTARSIT** is an international Software and Talent Acquisition company established in 2004 in Israel. Headquartered in Kyiv, AllSTARSIT operates software development hubs in Ukraine, the CEE Region, and sales offices in the UK, Germany, and the US.
**AllSTARSIT** is Top 3 IT employers in Ukraine.

**About the Project:**
Our partner is a young and fast-growing Israeli startup operating in a field of NFT avatars, which may look like simple digital headshots of cartoon or pixelated characters ‚Äî but they‚Äôre much more than that.
MetaVegas is a studio developing NFT for the metaverse. We strike the best balance between having the culture of a small independent studio and the resources of a massive growth platform. 

In blockchain technology, NFT is a non-fungible token (Non-Fungible Token), that is, unlike other tokens, which in the crypto world are something like an internal currency in video games, that cannot be exchanged for another token of this kind. The Metaverse has become a successful solution for the development of the NFT industry, which today is an integral part of some cryptocurrency projects. After all, in the center of it lies a lot of virtual things that surround users in a particular universe. These can be NFT paintings, furniture, avatars, clothes and accessories for them. Players want the game to have more features that go beyond the usual games. They want more digital experiences outside of the game. NFT makes it easy to transfer skins and other accessories between different games. 

NFT avatars are algorithmically generated digital images of cartoon or pixelated characters, usually from the shoulders up, that are in a ‚Äúprofile picture‚Äù format. Each NFT avatar is completely unique, with an array of distinguishing traits (i.e., clothing, hairstyles, accessories, etc.). The avatars can be cartoon animals, humans or abstract creatures, with fantasy and science fiction elements. 

**Specialization:** Blockchain, Gamedev
**Headquarters:** Israel
**Years on the market:** since 2021

**Previous experience:**
-4+ years experience in game, VR/AR, or film-related industries as a 3D artist or similar.

-Expert knowledge of high to low poly processes
-Attention to detail and problem-solving
-Excellent communication skills
-Upper-Intermediate English

-Solid foundation in art fundamentals of composition, design, lighting, etc.
-Passion and constant drive to stay up to date with the latest technologies and techniques.
-Scripting, rigging, and/or artist tool creation.

**Scope of work:**

-Collaborate with team members of other disciplines to meet milestone goals.
-Work closely with production to define deliverables and communicate expectations.
-Assist in R&D efforts.
-Troubleshoot technical and artistic issues.

**WHY DO YOU NEED TO CHOOSE AllSTARSIT?**
- Environment for development and growth(we have a learning and development program for each employee);

**If you are looking for a remote ‚Äòhome‚Äô to bring your 3D Art skills and experience, look no further. Bring your passion for creating awesome assets for a Virtual Reality App, and we'll provide an amazing team for you to work with along with a great environment and benefits. Apply today to start your MetaVegas adventure! **

Graphic Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing still and animated product renders and
images using software like Blender, Photoshop, Illustrator, and other common tools. Your primary focus will be on
producing high-quality visuals that effectively showcase our products. Additionally, you will be involved in creating
other visual and graphic design assets such as images for product manuals and posts on social media.

environments, and effects.

software.
2. Strong portfolio demonstrating your design and 3D animation skills, including examples of product
renders, images, and animations.
3. Solid understanding of design principles, composition, and color theory.
4. Knowledge of InDesign for creating print and digital layouts is essential.
5. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
6. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
7. Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
8. Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality designs.
9. Ability to work independently, take initiative, and meet project deadlines.
If you are a talented 3D animator and graphic designer with a strong portfolio and a passion for creating visually
appealing designs, we encourage you to apply for the position of 3D Animator and Graphic Designer. Join our team
and contribute to the development of compelling visual assets that enhance our brand and effectively showcase
our products.

title: 3D Artist (Unity, Hyper-Casual, Mobile)
description:
Are you looking to work with enthusiastic experts who are tackling game-changing challenges in entertainment and beyond? At Ubisoft, we offer an open environment where bright ideas are given a chance to shine and everyone is eager to share knowledge.

**Required skills**
Having acquired some initial experience in a similar position within the Mobile gaming industry, you wish to join a team that defines itself as ‚Äúserious about fun‚Äù. If the following description matches your profile, you‚Äôre in!

You are capable and proficient in integrating 3D assets in Unity.
You have knowledge in 3DS, Blender or any 3D software: take your pick and impress us! You are able to create or modify existing 3D assets to fit the project.
You have knowledge in Particle effects in Unity.
You have knowledge in Animations and Cameras in Unity.
You have knowledge in Lighting and Shaders in Unity.
You are also fully familiar with Photoshop and Illustrator;
Whether it be Flippy Race, 2048 or Knife Hit, your Hyper-Casual culture is second to none; You are obviously able to speak English in a professional environment.

Having knowledge of the current Hyper-Casual art codes and Trends is a Plus!

**Responsibilities**
As a 3D Artist with Ketchapp, you will join our internal production teams to create tomorrow‚Äôs bestsellers!

For the Production part, you will be in charge of the entire graphic side of our games that includes, integrating assets from packages to the game, creating VFX and lighting, implementing shaders, modifying assets or creating new ones if needed, preparing UI assets and preparing store assets such as Icons and Banners.

Working in collaboration with a developer, you will self-sufficiently implement your part of the project by taking into account design feedback from the Producer and the rest of the Production team.

Considering that Ketchapp teams are actively involved in the studio‚Äôs growth, entrepreneurial flair is welcome; we like to challenge ourselves, and suggestions for improvement are always taken into consideration.

**Project description**
Ubisoft teams are driven by their desire to enrich players‚Äô lives through original, memorable entertainment experiences. These teams bring to life whole new worlds ‚Äî veritable playing fields in which players can freely express their imagination, leading to moments of surprise, fun and adventure, as well as fostering learning and discovery.
For more than 6 years, via its Ubisoft Mobile entity, Ubisoft has also shaped worlds on smartphones and tablets via its portfolio of mobile games.
At Ubisoft Mobile, you will have a chance to develop your skills and work alongside dedicated team members who are pioneers in their field, throughout the world.
You will be part of a warm and stimulating environment in which you can push back the boundaries of both the imagination and technology to create worlds that will inspire our players.

Fully integrated in the Ubisoft environment and with more than 450 games in its catalogue, Ketchapp is the leading publisher of hyper-casual mobile games, and the name behind such hits as 2048, Knife Hit, Stack, Origame, Flipman, among others.

title: 3D Character Artist
description:
Values Value is a recruiting company with expertise in gamedev, is looking for a 3d Artist for one of our clients, Ukrainian studio, an enthusiastic young, motivated and passionate team who share the goal of making the best online MMO Sandbox on mobile devices.

The company is working on an open-world mobile multiplayer online action game focusing on social interaction. They strive to create the best open-world gaming experience inspired by the GTA series.

**What are you working on?**
Genres: Role-playing, MMO
Platforms: Mobile

**For which tasks (responsibilities)?**
- Close collaboration with a leading 3D artist, concept artists, 3D animators, and technical artists to create high-quality 3D models of characters, equipment, weapons, etc.
- Creating Hi/Lo models in accordance with concepts and technical constraints.
- Solving technical and creative tasks within the 3D department.
- Creating texture maps for PBR.
- Continuous analysis of visual trends and content development methods in the gaming industry and their integration into the studio's pipeline.

**What kind of professional are we looking for?**
- 3+ years of experience as a 3D modeler in the gaming industry.
- Strong knowledge of 3ds max/Maya/Blender, ZBrush.
- Excellent texturing skills (Substance Painter).
- Confident sculpting skills in Zbrush (anatomy, clothing elements).
- Good knowledge of anatomy.
- Understanding of the principles of optimizing 3D content for game engines.
- Knowledge of the process of baking textures from high-polygon models.
- Ability to feel proportions, rhythm, read concepts.
- Proficient in working with UV unwrapping, optimizing UV unwrapping for game models.
- Understanding of the PBR pipeline.
- Passion for games and knowledge of the gaming industry.
- Portfolio is mandatory.

**Nice to have:**
- Art education, ability to draw by hand.
- Experience with Unity3D, understanding of shader principles.
- Understanding of skinning and animation principles.
- Experience with version control systems (Git/SVN).
- Experience with Marvelous Designer.
- Experience with moderate stylization.

**Why do we enjoy working here?**
- Investments from the largest gaming fund with great expertise in games.
- An ambitious, new project in the genre. An early stage of development, so there is an opportunity to influence the project.
- Complex tasks.
- Opportunity to participate in decision-making regarding the development of the project.
- Flexible working conditions and a flexible schedule.
- Remote work.

**The selection process**
- Screening with VV Recruiter
- Meet and greet interview
- Technical interview

title: 3D Computational Geometry
description:
We would like to create a software solution for recognizing volumetric geometry in a drawing that comes from a 3D format such as a CAD STP or STEP file.  You will help create automation to measure shapes and recognize features from the data.  We already have a way to process the CAD file so that's not needed.  But we want to create an algorithm that can be used to automatically understand the geometry from the data.

**We need to look for your help for creating algorithms to interpret the data and do the following:** 
‚Ä®1)¬† Automatically recognize and measure surface area of volumetric geometry¬†¬†‚Ä®
2)¬†¬†Measure surfaces even if areas are not flat and uneven 
3)¬†¬†Geometric cleanup
4). This algorithm will be eventually used for doing geometric analysis of CAD files of parts to be manufactured using CNC milling and turning processes

**More information about needed background**
You don't necessarily have to have experience doing the above mentioned job.  But you should definitely have a strong knowledge for math and geometry and an ability to problem solve when making programming  applications or algorithms.  
You also may need to use C++ so not just .NET.  Hope you don't mind learning on the job.  

**Instructions to Apply**

Please introduce yourself and answer the following questions:
 1)  Do you have any experience developing an algorithm for any geometry related projects?
2)  Do you have any experience creating software for the manufacturing industry?
3)  Do you have any experience using Autocad?

**Please include your resume when you apply**

title: 3D Computer Vision and Deep Learning Developer
description:

- Conduct independent research and develop state-of-the-art implementations of advanced computer vision capabilities, such as Neural Rendering, 3D Reconstruction, Realtime 6DoF Object Pose Tracking, and 3D Scene Understanding
- Invent, implement and optimize vision and deep learning algorithms.

Requirements:
- 2+ years of working experience in 3D Computer Vision 
- 2+ years experience in relevant, high-tech, industrial jobs coding in C or C++, or Python
- MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field (with a minimum of 3 years of relevant experience)
- knowledge of Neural Rendering and Neural Fields: Realtime Novel View Synthesis (NVS); Realtime and Offline Neural 3D Reconstruction (including extraction of 3D geometry, texture, and lighting) from images
- Strong understanding of classical 3D geometric methods, including Multiple View Geometry, Structure from Motion (SfM), Point Cloud-based inference, camera calibration, feature matching-based registration, and non-linear optimization
